name: Gunblade Lower Back Holster
description: Gunblades are holstered across the lower back.

languages.description: Gunblades werden am unteren Rücken geholstert.
languages.name: Gunblade-Holster: Rücken, Unten

languages.description: Les Pistolames sont portés le long du bas du dos.
languages.name: Port de Pistolame au bas du dos

languages.description: Rinfodera le Gunblade nella parte bassa della schiena.
languages.name: Rinfodero Gunblade Schiena Bassa

languages.description: 건블레이드 계열 무기를 등 하부에 수납하는 수납 방식입니다.
languages.name: 건블레이드 등 하부 홀스터

languages.description: Los sables-pistola se enfundarán a través de la parte baja de la espalda.
languages.name: Enfundado de parte baja de la espalda de sable-pistola

languages.description: 将枪刃武器收纳在后腰处。
languages.name: 枪刃后背收纳姿态

languages.description: 背中の下部分にガンブレードを収納。
languages.name: ガンブレードボトムバック ホルスター

languages.description: As Lâmina-Armas são guardadas na lombar.
languages.name: Lâmina-Armas: Coldre Nas Costas (Inferior)

languages.description: 槍刃武器可跨過下背收納。
languages.name: 槍刃後腰收納姿態

languages.description: ดาบปืนที่ใส่ซองพาดหลังส่วนล่าง
languages.name: ซองดาบปืนด้านหลังส่วนล่าง

languages.description: Süngülü Silahlar belin alt tarafında taşınır.
languages.name: Süngülü Silah Alt Bel Kılıfı

languages.description: Мечестріли кріпляться на попереку, коли в руках інша зброя.
languages.name: Мечестріл на попереку
